attributes.action: ensure our armed forces personnel have their salary paid correctly!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Month after month wages for armed forces personnel are paid incorrectly resulting usually in them being underpaid. This should not be an issue. Any monies owed should be paid on time and be correctly calculated. There should be no reason to “budget”. Please Mr. Brown give surety that our countries defence personnel have their salaries paid correctly.
